DOC.brief_summary: oligomerized litchi fruit extract may enhance submaximal endurance exercise performance
DOC.brief_title: Effect Antioxidant Endurance Performance Healthy Men
DOC.detailed_description: Regular physical exercise many beneficial effect , report strenuous exercise could elevate production free radical reactive oxygen specie ( ROS ) eventually injure tissue decrease muscle function.So many kind antioxidant supplementation try decrease muscle fatigue enhance exercise performance . polyphenolic flavonoid abundant fruit leafy vegetable strong antioxidant effect . oligomerized litchi fruit extract strong antioxidant capacity high bioavailability compare grape seed polyphenol . The aim study determine whether oligomerized litchi fruit extract could induce endurance exercise performance Vit C + Vit E mixture placebo could . Therefore , design double blind randomize controlled trial , set change run time exhaustion submaximal treadmill test primary endpoint .
DOC.criteria: healthy men 20 year old nonsmoker BMI > 25 body fat > 25 % intake antioxidant supplement recent 2 week
